column4: my gutsy upgrade failed before completion while installing software update-manager and aptoncd failed to install and then it quit
how do I find out whether my failed gusty upgrade will work or explode in my face?
are you trying to upgrade from gutsy beta to gutsy final, or feisty to gutsy?
people might shout at me telling you this, but I'd recommend a fresh gutsy install, download gutsy.iso and do a fresh install :)
